xmbean.description:
XDS Query Service
Provides a Cross-enterprise Document Query Service for Document Consumer actor (Stored Query).

attribute.description: Proxy host if http access use http proxy. NONE = no proxy.
attribute.name: ProxyHost

attribute.description: Proxy port if http access use http proxy.
attribute.name: ProxyPort

attribute.description: URL of keystore containing certificate to identify this Document Source, when running in TLS mode.
attribute.name: KeyStoreURL

attribute.description: The password for access to keystore, specified by attribute TrustStoreURL.
attribute.name: KeyStorePassword

attribute.description: URL of trust store containing accepted certificates, when running in TLS mode.
attribute.name: TrustStoreURL

attribute.description: The password for access to trust store, specified by attribute TrustStoreURL.
attribute.name: TrustStorePassword

attribute.description: URL Hostname for HTTPS Hostname checking. CERT (from Certificate (standard)), * (no Check), hostname (only this URL Hostname).
attribute.name: AllowedUrlHost

attribute.description:
XDS Affinity Domain (Authority)
This name is used in PIX Query Service to get patient id of affinity domain.
You can disable PIX Query by setting this value with '=' as first character.
'=' : use the source patient ID and issuer.
'=?<Domain>' : use patientID from source and <Domain> as issuer.
'=<patient>' : use <patient> for patientID and issuer (patid^^^issuer).
attribute.name: AffinityDomain

operation.description:
Find Documents for a patient with given document status.
(Perform a 'Stored Query' based registry query with return type OBJECT_REF)
operation.name: findDocuments

parameter.description:
Status. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: Select of ReturnType. true: LeafClass, false: ObjectRef
parameter.name: useLeafClass

operation.description:
Find SubmissionSets for a patient with given SubmissionSet status.
(Perform a 'Stored Query' based registry query with return type OBJECT_REF)
operation.name: findSubmissionSets

parameter.description:
Status. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: status

operation.description:
Find Folders for a patient with given folder status.
(Perform a 'Stored Query' based registry query with return type OBJECT_REF)
operation.name: findFolders

parameter.description:
Status. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: status

parameter.description: Select of ReturnType. true: LeafClass, false: ObjectRef
parameter.name: useLeafClass

operation.description:
Get all registry content for a patient given the indicated status.
(Perform a 'Stored Query' based registry query with return type OBJECT_REF)
operation.name: getAll

parameter.description:
DocumentEntryStatus. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: docStatus

parameter.description:
SubmissionSetStatus. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: submissionSetStatus

parameter.description:
FolderStatus. (defined: Submitted, Approved, Deprecated)
Use null(empty) to get documents for all defined stati!
Formats the parameter to V3 statustype 'urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:StatusType:'
parameter.name: folderStatus

operation.description:
Get documents for given list of UUIDs.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getDocuments

operation.description:
Get documents for given list of UUIDs.
Use ',' to seperate entries.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getDocuments

operation.description:
Get folders for given list of UUIDs.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getFolders

operation.description:
Get folders for given list of UUIDs.
Use ',' to seperate entries.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getFolders

operation.description:
Retrieve a collection of XDSDocumentEntry objects and the Association objects surrounding them.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getDocumentsAndAssocs

operation.description:
Retrieve a collection of XDSDocumentEntry objects and the Association objects surrounding them.
Use ',' to seperate several uuids.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getDocumentsAndAssocs

parameter.description: List of document UUIDs, seperated by ','
parameter.name: uuids

operation.description:
Retrieve the XDSSubmissionSet objects used to submit a collection of XDSDocumentEntry and XDSFolder objects.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getSubmissionSets

operation.description:
Retrieve the XDSSubmissionSet objects used to submit a collection of XDSDocumentEntry and XDSFolder objects.
Use ',' to seperate entries.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getSubmissionSets

operation.description:
Retrieve an XDSSubmissionSet object along with its contents.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getSubmissionSetAndContents

operation.description:
Retrieve an XDSFolder object and its contents.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getFolderAndContents

operation.description:
Retrieve XDSFolder objects that contain the XDSDocumentEntry object provided with the query.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getFoldersForDocument

operation.description:
Retrieve XDSDocumentEntry objects that are related to the specified document via an Association object.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getRelatedDocuments

parameter.description: List of Association types, seperated with ','
parameter.name: assocTypes

operation.description:
Retrieve XDSDocumentEntry objects that are related to the specified document via an Association object.
Return type is LEAF_CLASS
operation.name: getRelatedDocuments
